text: Human nature refers to what is in people but which they cannot study or work at achieving.
author: Xun Zi

text: It's a great event to get outside and enjoy nature. I find it very exciting no matter how many times I see bald eagles.
author: Karen Armstrong

text: Some people just use beautiful things to just shop or to have a tribal feeling - 'Oh, blah, blah, blah, I'm wearing Hermes blah, blah, blah, I'm wearing Saint Laurent blah-blah blah' - because it's like a need, a tribe, recognition: 'Ahh, my Rolex.' But I run away from anything which is too recognizable - it's my nature.
author: Manolo Blahnik

text: French is a foreign language, but I've been speaking it since I was 18 so it's second nature to me.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

text: The laws of nature are but the mathematical thoughts of God.
author: Euclid
